description: Defines the interface IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, specifying callback methods related to container lifecycle events such as start, stop, failure, and state change, all operating with JsonObject data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class declaring callback methods for handling container events

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container starts, with event data

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container stops, with event data

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container fails, with event data

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container's state changes, with event data
